author: GamingBolt
description: The Witcher 4 just received an in-depth gameplay footage focusing on various technical aspects of the upcoming sequel. It must be noted that tech demos are not a representation of the final product, but still there were plenty of engine related details that a lot of players may not be aware of. Let's take a look at them!
title: The Witcher 4 Gameplay Is Looking MIND-BLOWING - 10 NEW DETAILS You Missed

author: GamingBolt
description:
The Nintendo Switch 2's launch is literally right around the corner, and as you would expect on the eve of a new Nintendo console's release, the excitement is palpable. 

Obviously, the fact that the Switch 2 is an iterative upgrade and, as such, a much more familiar piece of machinery than its predecessor means the mood surrounding it is a little more subdued in comparison, but at the end of the day, the fact remains that a next-gen Nintendo console is almost at our doorstep, for which we're more than a little excited. 

In the lead-up to its release, we've already spoken about it and covered some of its most crucial details and tidbits, but there's still plenty much left to talk about- and so, here, that's exactly what we're going to do.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Accessories - 12 Things You NEED TO KNOW Before You Buy | Pre-Order

author: GamingBolt
description:
The Elder Scrolls community is no stranger to modding, and sure enough, the recently released Oblivion Remastered also has a fair few solid mods available on PC as well, even if its modding scene is nowhere near as robust as other Bethesda RPGs just yet. 

We've already covered a handful of notable Oblivion Remastered mods to keep an eye on in a past feature, but there's still more to cover, so here, we're going to talk about fifteen more that you can find on NexusMods.

Link to all mods:

Lumiere - Lights of Cyrodiil - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivionremastered/mods/3100 

A More Complete World Map 8K - 4K - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivionremastered/mods/1464

Velvet Horizons - Clouds Replacer - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivionremastered/mods/3736

Forgotten Spells - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivionremastered/mods/3996

More Quick Keys - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivionremastered/mods/3880

Enhanced Light Radius (View Distance) - https://www.nexusmods.com/oblivionremastere
title: Still Playing The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered? 15 More Mods You Shouldn't Miss
